deliverables.title: Curriculum Development
deliverables.description: Initial survey, curriculum design, and prototyping platform for locally-hosted LLM training materials.
deliverables.pso: A co-created curriculum on locally-hosted LLMs tailored for network operations, developed collaboratively with IDREN member institutions.
keyIndicators: At least 8 survey responses from IDREN institutions

activities.name: Initial Needs Assessment Survey
activities.description: Distribute survey to identify technical gaps and institutional needs across IDREN members

activities.name: Curriculum Design and Development
activities.description: Design comprehensive curriculum based on survey findings

activities.name: Module Development
activities.description: Develop 5 training modules covering LLM fundamentals to advanced applications

activities.name: Platform Prototyping
activities.description: Build demo prototype for hands-on LLM deployment exercises

activities.name: Pilot Feedback Collection
activities.description: Gather feedback from pilot participants to refine materials

activities.name: Developing a Webpage Portal
activities.description: Create web portal for hosting training resources and community engagement

deliverables.title: Workshop Delivery
deliverables.description: Two hands-on workshop sessions focusing on LLM fundamentals and AI agentic workflows for network operations.
deliverables.pso: Hands-on workshops that train at least 20 network operations professionals from IDREN institutions on privacy-aware LLM deployment.

activities.name: Workshop Planning
activities.description: Develop workshop agenda, prepare materials, and coordinate logistics

activities.name: Workshop Session 1: LLM Fundamentals
activities.description: Introduction to Large Language Models, privacy-aware AI, and local deployment concepts

activities.name: Workshop Session 2: AI Agentic Workflow
activities.description: Hands-on training on AI agentic workflows and RAG pipelines for network operations

activities.name: Workshop Documentary
activities.description: Document workshop proceedings, create recordings and materials for future reference

deliverables.title: Survey and Analysis
deliverables.description: Comprehensive survey, case studies, and whitepaper development to document project impact.
deliverables.pso: Research outputs including case studies and policy insights for AI adoption in network operations across IDREN.

activities.name: Final Survey & Data Collection
activities.description: Conduct comprehensive survey to measure project impact and knowledge improvement

activities.name: Case Brief & Testimonial Collection
activities.description: Document real-world implementation examples from participating institutions

activities.name: Whitepaper on NetOps with AI
activities.description: Publish comprehensive whitepaper on AI adoption for network operations with policy insights

deliverables.title: Reporting
deliverables.description: Project reporting and dissemination of findings to stakeholders and funding organization.
deliverables.pso: Comprehensive project documentation and reporting to ISIF Asia and stakeholders.

activities.name: Midterm Reporting
activities.description: Submit progress report at project midpoint

activities.name: Final Report Writing & Dissemination
activities.description: Complete final project report and disseminate findings
